variables:

[email]         use email of sender in email
[domain]        use domain of email
[username]      use username of email
[randomname]    use a random name made from env/name.txt
[randombr]      use a random browser name from env/random.txt
[os]            use a random os extracted from env/os.txt
[location]      use a random location extracted from env/locations.txt
[emailbase64]   use encoded string of email
[link]          use a link extracted from env/link.txt

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
embedded:

<IMG SRC="cid:#IMAGEx">
